title: Organizational unit
description:
A business unit in the organization.

Organizational units are defining a hierarchy of business units in an organization. 
They are mostly use to enforce user access restrictions, partitioning data or reporting.

name.description: A unique internal name of the organizational unit.

fullName.description:
The fully qualified name of the unit including names of its parent units.   
Units composing the full name are separated by a slash character (`/`).

```
/Entertainment
/Entertainment/SonyPictures
/Entertainment/SonyMusic
/Entertainment/SonyMusic/RCA
/Entertainment/SonyMusic/Epics
/Electronics
/Electronics/EntertainmentSystem
/Electronics/Mobile
...
```

displayName.description: The name of the organizational unit in the user interface.

description.description: A short overview of the unit in the organization.

parent.description: The organizational unit owning this unit.

children.description: All other organizational units under this unit.
